Comment: The point of the coin isn't to get money, the point of the coin is to give money to Trump. Trump made over $100 million in fees, plus unknown people (presumably people acting in concert with Trump) ran away with over $20 billion when the rug was pulled. It's open corruption on a massive scale. This is not a shareholder meeting, he's meeting with the people who bribed him, and they all have convenient receipts for how much they gave Trump in the form of their crypto wallets.
